extendedInfo.description: NOTE: This app can only be used with the Rover 2.0 Wireless Spy Tank available exclusively at Brookstone stores and Brookstone.com. MAKE STEALTH YOUR MISSION. ROVER'S FREE APP IS THE "KEY" TO ITS IGNITION. Faster, stronger, better. Rover 2.0 will boldly go where no App-controlled tank has gone before. Discover strange new life forms at home or at work. Record their activitiesâand even communicate via two-way audio. ROVERâS equipped: â¢ Wide-angle video camera View, record and share your missions online, or capture digital photos. In Rover 2.0, you can control the angle of the video camera remotely. Its wide-angle lens captures more of its surroundings. â¢ Night vision and Stealth Mode Rover 2.0 lets you see (and record) in the dark with no lights for stealthy operations. Also has built-in headlights that can be turned on and off from your control device. â¢ Communicate via 2-way audio Listen to sound from Rover 2.0âs travels and transmit your own audio back through Rover 2.0âs built-in speaker. Roger, Rover! â¢ Boldly go up to 200 feet Rover 2.0 can travel 200 feet in unobstructed places, or 100 feet around walls. â¢ Steer by G-Drive Use your deviceâs accelerometer to make it like a steering wheel in your hand. â¢ Share Share Rover 2.0âs photos and videos on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Tumblr, and email. â¢ Generates its own Wi-Fi wireless connection for your device â¢ Runs on 6 AA batteries (included) â¢ Exclusively from Brookstone â¢ This message with self-destruct. (Not really.)

reviews.title: Improved since last update
reviews.comment: Update: App has been improved! Video doesn\'t freeze anymore!   Glad to see the devs are working on it, even of they are silent. As others have reported, it is a taggy and the slidder controls would do better to be buttons.  Tried this app on my friends iPhone and it works perfectly.  The Android market is unfortunately not the devs top priority, and it is a shame because the tank is really cool otherwise.
reviews.author: Taylor Liss

reviews.title: Video does not work on Galaxy Note 10.1
reviews.comment: \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205UPDATE JULY 31...., New update came down from the gods and how everything works properly.  This tank is fun. Wish it were a bit faster, but still a blast...........Device looks ultra cool.  Drives with no problem.  Connects through wifi just fine.  All controls seem to work except live video. After a few seconds video freezes.... Have to close app and then reopen only to find video freezes after a few seconds ad nauseum.  Also,  application occasionally seems to force close.  What is the fun of a spy tank if live video does not work?  It\'s a real shame too.  Device is cool and would definitely be fun if this problem was to be addressed... But unless it is,  the product is to expensive for a remote control tank with no video capability. I will advise if I can find a work around our If dev team responds with instructions. Does anyone else have these problems or constructive answers/solutions? gregautry@gmail.com
reviews.author: Greg Autry

reviews.title: Updated app, much improved for Note 8 tablet
reviews.comment: A big thanks for the app update!  Everything now appears, literally, to work on my Samsung Galaxy Note 8 tablet.  So happy the live video feed is working after the update.  Very happy with the purchase.  The slider motion controls could be better, as it almost seems just no go or full speed, but otherwise a fun toy.
reviews.author: Daniel De Clute-Melancon

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works perfectly fine for my Galaxy note 2 & Galaxy tab 3 8 inch since the update
reviews.author: AL M

reviews.title: Fix the freaking app!
reviews.comment: Everything works but lags terribly making it impossible to drive when out of your sight. The app clearly needs fixing cuz right now I paid 150 dollars for a paperweight!

reviews.comment: Video does not work on my Nexus 7. But on Motorola defy, Motorola bravo, Nook color - work!

reviews.title: Very bad program
reviews.comment: I tried it with tab 7+ and note 10.1 it work only for 30sec or something then stop working, plz upgrade this program
reviews.author: Ramy Rady

reviews.title: Not That Bad
reviews.comment: After reading these bad reviews, I was skeptical about purchasing but the price dropped to 119 and I jumped on it.  Downloaded the app and crossed my fingers.  It worked!!  No problems, camera, video, everything works.  Could be a little more responsive, but considering the other reviews, I\'m happy.
reviews.author: Keith Garrison

reviews.title: Disappoinment
reviews.comment: I waited forever to get the rover. It lags impossible to control... I\'m taking it back.
reviews.author: Steven Soto

reviews.title: What the balls?
reviews.comment: I bought this thing for 145$ to find out the app doesn\'t even open for me? Total ripoff. Get it updated or I send it back. Brownstone looks like they got stoned.
reviews.author: Blake Petrenchik

reviews.title: Does not work!!
reviews.comment: It says my internet connection is not connected although it is! Wish I knew the problem cuz I\'d like to use it..but I gues I\'m uninstalling :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with Nexus 7 or Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: On Nexus 7 the controls show up and you can control the robot using both the sliders and the accelerometer, but the video and audio feeds don\'t work at all. On Galaxy Nexus the app won\'t install.  I bought this as a Christmas present for my now very disappointed daughter. Exchanged it at the Brookstone store today, assuming the robot itself was faulty, but the replacement unit had the same trouble (and kept dropping wifi), so I\'m back to the mall _again_ to get a refund.   The robot is cheaply made and not worth the price. The app clearly is not finished - if it can\'t run on a Nexus device it clearly has been inadequately tested. Avoid.
reviews.author: John Clarke

reviews.title: My dad paid a lot of money for this
reviews.comment: You better fix this because it opens then just force closes on my virgin mobile venture. I had high hopes for this.:-(
reviews.author: Clifton Favors

reviews.title: Great Expectations still deliverable
reviews.comment: I too have noted some lag in control and video, when operating in areas with competing WiFi signals, 2.5 GHz cameras, etc.. I would like to see sensitivity adjustments and/or single finger control option. I have Evo 3d, anyone tried the original Rover App with new Rover 2.0 tank or multi-core devices?
reviews.author: Darryl Jones

reviews.title: Awrsome idea bad end product
reviews.comment: Audio and video doesnt work on nexus 7. Galaxy s3 works but do horribly lagged that its impossible to driver rover, even when right next to it. Expensive rover is useless with this app. PLEASE FIX THIS APP or atleast release documentation on protocall so we can make one that actually works as advertised.
reviews.author: A Google User
